overview: Eat Fresh! Tired of those wimpy sandwiches that leave you wanting more? Taste the sandwich that hits the spot every time with 2 heaping helpings of heavenly hooters! Two pairs of plump, succulent breasts, stacked tall and piled high, covered with gobs of creamy dick dressing and bursting with juicy flavor! These mouth-watering milk-shakers are round, soft and always served fresh. Double your pleasure and double the fun, two pairs of knockers are always better than one!
title: Double Decker Sandwich 8
